title: Font resembling melting ice cubes?
content:
I am creating a new site for a massage parlour called "wet" and they want the logo to look like melting ice cubes or like the letter are sweating or some other such tacky thing.

Any ideas out there?

Thanks for your time.
author: Emme

comments.content:
[Wet-Pet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150115065758/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/wet-pet/) tacky but still not without charms.  
Tim

Yeah, I looked at that one, but it isn't quite what she's after.  
Thanks though!
I think this theme has been talked about before. You might contact an admistrator to find the thread.
